text: Crozet may refer to: * Crozet Islands, a sub-antarctic archipelago of small islands in the southern Indian Ocean, part of the French Southern Territories * Crozet, a commune in France of the Ain département, in France * Crozet, Virginia, a census-designated place, United States * Benoit Claudius Crozet, educator and civil engineer (1789-1864)
title: Crozet
